description:
syscall: implement Sendfile for Darwin.
Update issue 5847
Summary: syscall: implement Sendfile for OpenBSD and NetBSD

messages.text:
LGTM

You can leave the go1.2.txt addition in this CL, but I doubt we're going to mention it in the release notes.

On 2013/07/08 19:33:12, rsc wrote:
> LGTM
> 
> You can leave the go1.2.txt addition in this CL, but I doubt we're going to
> mention it in the release notes.

LGTM. Tested on darwin/amd64 10.8.4

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f50f0c6630d1 ***

syscall: implement Sendfile for Darwin.
Update issue 5847
Summary: syscall: implement Sendfile for OpenBSD and NetBSD

R=golang-dev, rsc, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10980043

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

https://codereview.appspot.com/10980043/diff/6001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_darwin_amd64.go
File src/pkg/syscall/syscall_darwin_amd64.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10980043/diff/6001/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_darwin_amd64.go#newcode70
src/pkg/syscall/syscall_darwin_amd64.go:70: func Syscall9(num, a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8, a9 uintptr) (r1, r2 uintptr, err Errno) // sic
not relevant for this CL, but added for consistency with darwin/386.

subject: code review 10980043: syscall: implement Sendfile for Darwin.
